EmailTemplate.name: 201811_Americas_Email_WebSurvey_mih.201811_Americas_Email_WebSurvey_mih
EmailTemplate.subject: Share Your Opinion and Receive $50 Amazon Gift Card!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> YOUR OPINION MATTERS Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Are you interested in being a part of the website development process? We have the perfect opportunity for you!
We are evaluating our website for navigation and design, so our user experience team is conducting a one-hour user experience study. By participating in this study, you get to help us determine our future path, and you will receive a $50 Amazon gift card for your time.
To take part, please email Claudia.Guerrero@Honeywell.com <[[mailto:Claudia.Guerrero@Honeywell.com]]> ASAP. We are conducting the user experience study Nov. 14-15.
We look forward to hearing from you!
Honeywell Aerospace
